column1: '''Společnost Přátel Díla Pana JRRTolkiena''' (Czech:'''Society of Friends of the Works of J.R.R. Tolkien''')
column3: is the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] in the Czech Republic founded in [[1992]] to commemorate the centenary of J.R.R. Tolkien's birthday.<ref>http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=Activities1993Czech (accessed 06-12-2011)</ref>

column1: SPDPJRRT publishes ''Palantir'' (information bulletin) and ''Thorin'' (quasi-academic journal) on a periodic basis.
